title: Terminate a Purchase Contract
description: During the inspection period, a buyer decides to terminate the purchase contract due to major structural issues found.

tasks.description: Advise the buyer on their right to terminate under the inspection contingency.
tasks.expected_outcome: The buyer understands their contractual right to cancel.

tasks.description: Draft a formal notice of termination and a request for the return of the earnest money deposit.
tasks.expected_outcome: A legally sound termination notice is generated.

tasks.description: Send the termination notice to the listing agent and the title company to initiate the earnest money refund process.
tasks.expected_outcome: All parties are notified of the termination, and the process to refund the deposit begins.
